column2: df.platform <- df.raw %>% select(Q2.3, grep("Q7.7", names(df.raw))) %>% gather(statement, response, 2:8)
plot.platform_yes <- ggplot(df.platform %>% filter(Q2.3 == "Yes"), mapping = aes(x = factor(statement))) +
plot.platform_no <- ggplot(df.platform %>% filter(Q2.3 == "No"), mapping = aes(x = factor(statement))) +
ggarrange(plot.platform_yes, plot.platform_no, ncol = 2, common.legend = TRUE, legend = "right")
